thread.title: Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text:
I've been using Groupon for several years and have always had good luck. They provide excellent deals and customer service is top notch. Bought one Groupon several years ago for a restaurant/bar, by the time I went to use it, couple weeks later, the restaurant was closed. I filled a dispute on Groupon, they verified the place had closed and promptly refunded my money. That is great customer service, they can't control if a place closes.
The items I have bought from Groupon were exactly as described and worked perfectly. It is a pleasure doing business with them.
